description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a React application, defining light and dark theme colors and styles for various components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container styling with centered text and dynamic background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo including animation specifications.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, including layout and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for the theme toggle feature, including hover effects.
